name.es: Prime Video Skipper: omitir introducciones y resúmenes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Automatically skip intros, recaps, and click next episode button on Amazon Prime Video
short.de: Überspringen Sie automatisch Intros und Rückblicke und klicken Sie auf die Schaltfläche „Nächste Episode“ bei Amazon Prime Video
short.es: Omita automáticamente introducciones, resúmenes y haga clic en el botón del siguiente episodio en Amazon Prime Video
short.fr: Ignorez automatiquement les intros, les récapitulatifs et cliquez sur le bouton de l'épisode suivant sur Amazon Prime Video
short.pl: Automatycznie pomijaj wstępy, podsumowania i klikaj przycisk następnego odcinka w Amazon Prime Video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension provides options to automaticaly skip fragments of video.

Extension to skip all intros, recaps and fast forward ads when watching Amazon Prime Video series.   

Save your time, muscles and keyboard buttons! 
One click to play all series episodes in a row without a single move from the couch. 

Add PrimeVideoSkipper to your browser to automatically:

- Fast forward pre-roll ads
- Skip all intros and recaps 
- Go to the next episode

One extension to play all episodes of your favorite series in a row smoothly. All you need to do is to add the extension to your browser, switch on skipping options using toggles and log into your Amazon Prime Video account. You are ready to binge series all night. It is as simple as that!

No unnecessary clicking when watching Amazon Prime Video series anymore!

How does it work?
Skipper automatically clicks "skip" buttons which appear while watching. Please note that this extension was developed and tested for the English version only. It may not work for other languages or if the "skip" button is not available by default.

Disclaimer : Prime Video is a trademark of Amazon.com, Inc.. This website & extension hold no association or affiliation with Amazon Prime Video or any third-party companies.
